about.title: Men
about.intro: Salom! Men G'iyosiddin, O'zbekistonlik dasturchiman. Asosan sun'iy intellekt (AI) sohasida ishlayman va bu soha menga juda qiziq. Web va mobile dasturlash tajribam ham bor.
about.passion: Men doimo yangi texnologiyalarni o'rganishga va murakkab muammolarni hal qilishga intilam–∞n. Mening maqsadim - texnologiya orqali odamlar hayotini yaxshilash.
about.current: Hozirda yangi loyihalar ustida ishlayman va AI sohasidagi bilimlarimni oshirib boraman.

ai.title: AI & Machine Learning
ai.description: Sun'iy intellekt va Machine Learning sohasida loyihalar yarataman. NLP, Computer Vision va Deep Learning texnologiyalari bilan ishlayman.

web.title: Web Development
web.description: Zamonaviy web ilovalar yarataman. React, TypeScript, Node.js va boshqa texnologiyalar bilan full-stack development.

mobile.title: Mobile Development
mobile.description: Flutter yordamida cross-platform mobil ilovalar yarataman. Android va iOS uchun bir koddan ishlaydigan ilovalar.
